attributes.action: Compulsory measuring & public reporting of emissions by companies (500k+)
attributes.background: In addition to urgent action needed to fight climate change (United Nations), air pollution is responsible for 1 in 8 deaths worldwide (World Health Organization). If most companies measure and reduce their emissions they will be part of the solution.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
